virtual_dili_panel.risk_drivers: hERG high risk; Medium clearance risk; logP >= 4; Aqueous solubility <= -5
virtual_dili_panel.recommendation: Trigger full DILI workup (in vitro hepatocytes + mechanistic assays).
virtual_dili_panel.action_pack: Required: bile acid transporter inhibition (BSEP/MRP2) and bile canaliculi integrity assays. Required: reactive metabolite trapping plus mitochondrial toxicity profiling. Required: time-dependent CYP inhibition and covalent binding evaluation. Required: repeat-dose rodent study with enhanced liver histopathology and serum biomarkers (ALT/AST, GLDH, K18). Gate: advancement requires dual-negative across proximal DILI mechanisms or SAR-driven mitigation with retest.

virtual_cyp_tdi_panel.risk_drivers: Moderate clearance risk; High metabolite count (>=6)
virtual_cyp_tdi_panel.recommendation: Evaluate TDI risk with mechanistic assays and adjust chemistry immediately.
